title: The Local Workforce
prompt: A worn wooden table in a modest kitchen flooded with golden morning light, hands of different ages working together over papers and a laptopâ€”one person pointing at a screen showing a training program, another holding a handwritten note, a coffee mug and work gloves nearby. The scene captures quiet determination and intergenerational knowledge-sharing, shot from above at a slight angle to emphasize the collaborative workspace, with soft shadows and the texture of rural domesticity creating a documentary feel of people building something sustainable within their own community.
